Less common HTML elements

Tags: HTML

Miscellaneous

<b>bold</b><br/>
<strong>strong</strong><br/>
<i>italic</i><br/>
<em>emphasized</em><br/>
<big>big</big><br/>
<small>small</small><br/>
<sub>subsript</sub><br/>
<sup>superscript</sup><br/>
<del>deletion</del><br/>
<ins>insertion</ins><br/>
<code>code</code>

preformat

<pre>
for n in range(100):
    print (n)
print("Hello world")</pre>
<p>
for n in range(100):
    print (n)
print("Hello world")</p>

for n in range(100):
    print (n)
print("Hello world")

for n in range(100): print (n) print("Hello world")

address

<address>
written by <a href="mailto:js@gmail.com">John Smith</a><br/>
visit us at <a href="https://www.js.com">www.js.com</a><br/>
</address>
written by John Smith
visit us at www.js.com

Abbr and blockquote

<abbr title="coronavirus">CoV</abbr><br/>
<blockquote>
This is a multiline long quote.<br/>
It contains three lines in total.<br/>
Each line is ended with linebreak.<br/>
</blockquote>

CoV

This is a multiline long quote.
It contains three lines in total.
Each line is ended with linebreak.
